item.title: ‘Motor City’ Stars Shailene Woodley and Ben Foster on Method Dressing and New (Dialogue-Free) Film
item.description: The actors sat down with The Hollywood Reporter during the Venice Film Festival to talk playlists, Potsy Ponciroli’s experimental action thriller and whether or not they’ve seen ‘Reacher.’

item.title: ‘Motor City’ Stars Shailene Woodley and Ben Foster on Method Dressing and New (Dialogue-Free) Film

item.title: Shailene Woodley Joins Lindsay Lohan in ‘Count My Lies’ Drama at Hulu
item.description: The Disney-owned streamer has formally picked up the limited series, which is based on a novel by Sophie Stava.

item.title: Lindsay Lohan and Shailene Woodley Limited Series ‘Count My Lies’ Greenlit at Hulu
item.description: Hulu has given a series order to “Count My Lies,” a limited series starring Lindsay Lohan and Shailene Woodley, who serve as executive producers alongside “This Is Us” showrunn
